title: In the Willamette Valley
intro: Westwood Farms is situated on the 45th parallel in the Willamette Valley, Oregon -- a premium location for cultivating our hops and hazelnuts.
body: Our crops thrive in sandy-loam soils along the Willamette River with a natural water supply and excellent drainage.  Our farm is conveniently accessible from Portland and Salem, making it easy to come for a visit and enjoy a tour, especially during fresh hopping season.
